name: Artur
aboutMe: A hard-working and highly motivated specialist with tech industry experience including a wide variety of project work. Able to learn new technologies fast, adapt to different teams, and communicate effectively. With extensive knowledge of betting applications, I would like the opportunity to explore other fields and use my highly transferrable skills gained through the years in a creative, developer environment.

technical.name: Javascript
technical.additionalInfo: ES6 onwards, React, React Native, Typescript, JQuery, Node.js

technical.name: Digital design
technical.additionalInfo: Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Flash, Adobe XD, Figma

personal.name: Teamwork
personal.additionalInfo: Actively participating in all team discussions, quickly adapting to the environment, always striving for excellence

personal.name: Problem-Solving
personal.additionalInfo: Determining the cause of the problem; identifying, prioritizing, and selecting alternatives for a solution; and implementing a solution.

personal.name: Stakeholder Management
personal.additionalInfo: Answering key stakeholder queries. Updating stakeholders on project progress. Client relationship building and maintenance.

list: Writing sustainable code that can be modified and scaled.
Interaction with designers and developers to create modern and user-friendly interfaces.
Working in a collaborative environment with shared code

roles.workedOn: Casino games, small one-page configuration tools to deploy configuration, proxy.
roles.description: While working on this project, I gained a lot of experience with a typed language and making visualizations of interesting slot design ideas and their behaviour, bringing to life various animation mechanisms. Assembling bit by bit into a whole slot machine.
roles.tools: Tools: Git, Jira, Visual Studio Code, PHPStorm

roles.description: I created an admin panel that was made for the needs of a project that connected to an obd2 port to set up configurations and other options.
I developed a library of medical terms for AIBody, a medical VR application.

I was part of the frontend team that created a mobile application that gave car statistics and trio data. I  was responsible for building the Android application that interacted with the backend handled by other teams. The team developed many features for thi application.
roles.graphicTools: AdobeXD, Zeplin, Figma, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator

roles.description: I modified an existing wordpress site to use adaptive design and work for both mobile and desktop.
I developed a backgammon game online in real-time using web sockets
I worked on a small project in which it was possible to buy plots of land for ether and resell them.

roles.workedOn: Wordpress, sites on angular framework, html5 bunners .etc
roles.description: I worked on a small project in which it was possible to buy plots of land for ether and resell them.

This role was a transition period for me as I switched from Digital Designer to Web Developer. I worked hard on further improving my skills as well as ensuring that I can utilise my existing knowledge to its fullest potential. Seeing both sides of development process gave me a great insight and ability to contribute on both fronts when it was needed.

I worked as a digital designer for about a year and a half. Assembly of roulettes for casinos, slots, poker applications. Production of banners, preparation of artistic graphics for slots. The rest of this period I worked as a webdeveloper.
I assembled roulettes for casino applications, created banners and prepared artistic graphics for slot machines.
roles.graphicTools: Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Flash
